alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Autauga, east central Perry and Dallas Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Paul M Grist State Park to near Orrville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Selma, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Orrville, Billingsley, Gardner Island, Tyler, Old Cahaba Park, Dallas County Horse Arena, Mulberry, Belknap, Paul M Grist State Park, Dallas Lake, Memorial Stadium, Burnsville, Potter Station, Dannelly Reservoir, Robert F. Henry Lock And Dam, Hazen and Craig Field Aiport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
